mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reactionPoint SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), relTypeCode = #{relTypeCode}, relId= #{relId}, memberId = #{actorId}, `point` = 1
INSERT INTO reactionPoint SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), relTypeCode = #{relTypeCode}, relId= #{relId}, memberId = #{actorId}, `point` = - 1
INSERT INTO reactionPoint SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), relTypeCode = 'reply', relId= #{relId}, memberId = #{actorId}, `point` = 1
mapper.select: SELECT RP.relTypeCode, RP.relId, SUM(IF(RP.point > 0, RP.point, 0)) AS goodReactionPoint, SUM(IF(RP.point < 0, RP.point * -1, 0)) AS badReactionPoint FROM reactionPoint AS RP WHERE RP.memberId = #{actorId} GROUP BY RP.relTypeCode, RP.relId
